titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the assizes held in Warwick, April the 1st. 1690 by John Willes ...; published at the request of the high sheriff and grand jury, for the county of Warwick.
titleStmt.author: Willes, John, 1646 or 7-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare ..., and published by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur, April 23, 1690. C. Alson"-on verso of t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
